head.title: School District of Arcadia | Arcadia, WI

div.a: +

div.div: The School District of Arcadia will be closed starting Tuesday, March 17 at 3:45 PM and will be closed for the rest of the 2019-2020 school year per the most recent order from the state of Wisconsin. Please stay tuned to email, social media,and phone messages for further updates as the situation continues to change. Learn More

div.div: Mission Statement: The School District of Arcadia is a Professional Learning Community that exists to ensure ALL children learn.
Vision Statement: The School District of Arcadia will:

li.div: use student data to improve instructional practices.
prepare students to be college and career ready in a global society.

p.span: What are you reading during these safer at home times? #ArcadiaStrong
Class of 2020 has great class. Congrats.

div.p: The School District of Arcadia will be closed starting Tuesday, March 17 at 3:45 PM and will be closed indefinitely per the most recent order from the state of Wisconsin. There will be restricted or no access for anyone after that until further notice. Please stay tuned to email,...
